website_summaries.verdict: Large battery charger also gives you the ability to test the status of any battery you have at home.
pros: Battery charger with good longevity, thanks to a built-in cooling fan that ensures high performance
Wheeled unit can be taken anywhere you need it
Has a 200-amp mode for emergency starting situations and a 40-amp mode for fast charging of a low battery

customer_reviews.title: Works great, but I was hoping for a little bit more "smarts"
customer_reviews.text: Works fine and does a nice job charging batteries and jumpstarting cars, but it sure seems like it would be capable of sensing when the battery is fully charged and turning itself off. It doesn't. You can set a timer and have the charging stop after whatever time interval you want, but how do I know how long my battery needs to be fully charged?? All in all, I'm still happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: GreenAdam

customer_reviews.title: Non connected wires & loose bolts inside unit.  CAUTION!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this unit and started to put it together. When I put it together I kept hearing a loose bolt inside the unit when I would move it around. I opened the unit and saw that there was a bolt that was not securing part of the wires in the unit. Also the batter tester wire was not secured to anything. It was just flopping around and could have touched another wire and shorted out. Returned the unit and decided to go with a different brand. BEWARE if you purchase this. Make sure all wires are securely connected inside!
customer_reviews.author: JJK303

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality control
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without the axle caps and one of the axle brackets has the screw hole drilled into the curved aspect of the bracket making it impossible to attach to the chassis.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas R. Sparks

customer_reviews.title: Missing rear tire axel
customer_reviews.text: Was missing the rear axel. Cannot get the Schumacher customer service to answer their phone. Will return to Amazon if I cannot get the axel. It is dangerous to use without the axel.
customer_reviews.author: Keith C.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality to have them both quit inside of 18 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for service department use. Each used probably once per day. After 9 months one quit (was replaced by Schumacher under warranty that took a month) The other quit after 15 months. Poor quality to have them both quit inside of 18 months.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Huppert

customer_reviews.title: Would be nice if they shipped the correct hardware for assembly
customer_reviews.text: Would be nice if they shipped the correct hardware for assembly. It's really not that complicated a process but it become one when you have to make a special trip to the hardware store to buy the correct screws for attaching the handle. This is a fault with Schumacher. Don't they check to make sure the hardware they are shipping with the item is actually for the item???
customer_reviews.author: Paul Grant

customer_reviews.title: Did work great!
customer_reviews.text: Updated Review: After one winter season of occasional use, the unit has failed. No power output to the bank. Ill tinker with it and see if it's worth fixing... but shouldn't have to already. Was a good unit when it ran. Besides coming chin the factory with a big dent and missing screws, it was fine and we were happy. But unless you're willing to buy one 3 times a year, may wanna pass on this off shore scrap.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Battery Charger Don't Fully Work
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this Battery Charger on the assumption that it was one of the best ,after battery charger set for a few weeks and I decided to use it I notice that it did sound funny and making no noise ,then after about another week I notice the fan in the rear of the charger was not working. Decided to charge my Lawn Mower Battery today (11-01-2018 ) and I notice that the charger sound very week and the charger don't seem to work. Battery charge cables are very small. This charger is cleared defected.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: "Shockingly" good value!
customer_reviews.text: Our Charger/jump starter came undamaged and working flawlessly. This unit has jumped everything from full sized kenworth semi's to everyday cars and trucks. It has also provided a safe consistent charge when needed. It does what it is advertised to do and provides a great value. Every shop should have one for the moment you don't expect. Its going strong after one year of fairly heavy commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Denk

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be much better
customer_reviews.text: Does it's job. I have two suggestions though. You have to do a little assembly of the wheels and handle and you can really see how weak the metal casing is so I just added a few self tapping screws in areas that made it much stronger. Second. There is so much wasted space in this thing they could easily put a battery in it for the ability to do a mobile jump start without it being plugged it.
customer_reviews.author: DNHQ

customer_reviews.title: Dented and parts missing...
customer_reviews.text: The charger looks like it was dropped and it's missing parts. From reading the other reviewers, I'm not wasting my time ordering another one!
customer_reviews.author: Ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This was actually smaller than expected which actually works perfectly. It looks huge in the picture and I will be honest I didn't read the description it gave. We use this to charge up my husbands battery in his Willys before we take it crawling because something in his Jeep is sucking battery power. We are able to take this with us incase we need to charge a battery for anyone else. This was totally worth the money we paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great! I use it all the time and I'm glad I bought this one. I'm skeptical of the "battery tester" so I have a second device for that, to be fair this hasn't been wrong yet. Would highly recommend. The only thing I would change is the wheels, these are just plastic, I wish they were more substantial, but I guess it's not necessary. I certainly wouldn't deduct stars, and doesn't change the function.
customer_reviews.author: Affixer

customer_reviews.title: Charger defective out of box. No instructions on warranty service.
customer_reviews.text: purchased this charger in June 2019. Had ankle surgery in July so did not use or even open box until December 3rd. This charger is weaker than my 10 amp charger and amp and volt gauges do not work. Have had it connected for almost 2 days and still shows less than 10 amp charge rate on 40 amp setting. It came with holes in bottom of charger not drilled out and no instruction manual.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It worked but charge meter is confusing
customer_reviews.text: It worked to start my car, but the needle indicating how charged the battery is was confusing. The needle was going up for the first three hours of charging, but then dropped to half the amps. I noticed that the needle changed depending on the rate I was charging the battery and so was not measuring the charge on the battery. This made it hard to know when the battery had been sufficiently charged.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler W.

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived well packaged and damage free. Assembly was simple and so far the machine performs flawlessly just as I would expect from the Schumacher name. Good price for a great product. I use it on everything from ATV batteries to pickup batteries to semi truck batteries and jumps. I have not been let down ever. This is one product that every man should have, whether for home or commercial use, the SE-4022 will not let you down!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mooney

customer_reviews.title: Timer is broken
customer_reviews.text: The first time I went to use this item everything seemed great. I set the timer for 60 minutes at 4 amps. I came back roughly 2 hours later or so and it was still running. The timer was still ticking, and the charger was running. After further inspection; the timer that comes with the charger was broken. Which isn't a huge deal but I am glad I didn't have the amps set any higher.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Wells

customer_reviews.title: Not professional grade
customer_reviews.text: The charger works but it is not professional grade. The front foot o. The charger is plastic , the cables are not heavy enough and the clips are not full size. There being cheap. For a few bucks more they can step up the overall quality.
customer_reviews.author: epilot_06

customer_reviews.title: Not well made.
customer_reviews.text: The first one I purchased died after one week. I returned it, bought a second. It charges but the timer gets stuck before shutting off the charger so I overcharged a battery. My first purchase of a Schumacher charger was in 1995 and it lasted over 20 years with regular use. Looks like the new versions are a flop.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Manual charger
customer_reviews.text: Excellent charger that works well. It's not automatic, but not necessary with the timer. I don't like automatic units because they can fail easily if the electronics goes south; with manuals, there's nothing that can take it down (other than the rectifiers smoking or the power transformer). Straight forward charger that provides the power it's rated for.
customer_reviews.author: Gary F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect all-around charger
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this charger to charge and help start everything from my diesel pickup, to my ATV and the levels it has work perfect for my needs. I've used it to start and charge my diesel pickup and it only took a couple of minutes on the highest setting to get it cranked up. I also use it to trickle charge my ATV battery when it has been sitting for awhile. My only complaint is that I wish the cables were longer so I didn't need to use an extension cord and when using it on my pickup, the charger must be right next to the truck to reach one of the batteries. Other then that, it has performed wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Blazer

customer_reviews.title: Might make a good paper weight
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for four months. I tried using a couple times on my motorcycles and it did not work, figured the batteries were bad. Tried it today on my Ford Escape and nothing, I measure voltage but no amps. Not sure why it does not work but it was a waste of good money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Horrible setup.
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a nightmare to put the screws into. Had to buy screws that’s would actually fit. The people that designed this product to put together need to be shot. Horrible setup.
customer_reviews.author: luke degelia

customer_reviews.title: Premier charger with terrible tires
customer_reviews.text: This is a great charger. I ordered it and received it three days later with standard shipping charges. Pretty impressive huh!!! The only bad thing is the plastic, injection molded tires that come with the unit. They are hollow and pretty thin. I can't imagine they would last any length of time if it is moved around frequently. I did not even put them on the unit. I went to Home Depot and bought some hard rubber tires with metal wheels and had to buy some bushings as the axle on the unit is fairly small. It is now a great unit! Schumacher should just spend a little bit more for better tires and charge four or five dollars more.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Laskowski

customer_reviews.title: Bad cable connections the cables and system fell Apert and no longer works. No warranty Amazon should remove this item if they d
customer_reviews.text: Handles corroded after 5 months and will not charge or jump start Anything There is nothing on site here to do a warranty or exchange. Disappointing
customer_reviews.author: charles dillard

customer_reviews.title: heavy duty battery charger
customer_reviews.text: Nice battery charger with multiple charging selections. I really like that you can set the timer and walk away knowing it will cut off when the timer runs out. It also has a battery test switch for both 12v and 6v batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: My rating isnt very good. Well it is not charging my batteries
customer_reviews.text: My rating isnt very good. Well it is not charging my batteries. I would like to return it but last return date was jan 31,2018. So now what do i do for a refund? I would like someone to contact me about this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Burlison

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I wanted, expected, and needed. It charges batteries of all types, but just as importantly, it has a starter feature which allows me to get my tractors going when batteries are low. It is not a so called "smart" charger in that it does not read when the battery is fully charged and then stops charging. It does have a timer, however, and if in doubt, just dial in some required time and come back later. I love it. I had bought one similar about 15 years ago or more, and it lasted all this time even though exposed sometimes to the elements. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cloud

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger because I needed to charge a battery belonging to a vehicle that has been sitting for a while. I have only used this charger for a short while, but feel comfortable that this charger will last. This charger is heavier than expected, but works great. The charger was a little difficult to put together (i.e.: foot, wheels and handle), but once figured out, it worked like a charm. With Prime Shipping, this item arrived earlier than I expected. Hassle-free transaction.
customer_reviews.author: PKossow

customer_reviews.title: Timer quit fan motor squeals
customer_reviews.text: It's been over a yr since i bought this charger. It's ok for the price. 2 the things that happen... The timer stopped working it won't time out an turn off.. That's not good if your forgetful. 2nd the fan has a vibrating sqeal. I used some wd40 to correct the problem. Sometimes it will still squeal.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Z.

customer_reviews.title: one bad apple.
customer_reviews.text: Machine did not work out of the box....returned it for refund. Still looking for a good charger/starter.
customer_reviews.author: PaPa's Garage

customer_reviews.title: Good construction with bad jumper cables
customer_reviews.text: Good construction with bad jumper cables! If charging a battery using this guy make sure you make it outdoor or stay there otherwise it could turn in to disaster, the cables heat and melt the plastic cover! I am looking in to replacing with larger gauge cable ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: S-M-and-II

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had any problems with the Schumacher products that I ...
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any problems with the Schumacher products that I have gotten. I was impressed with the price compared to actually going to a store to buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: brand new, but doesn't work at all. electrical ...
customer_reviews.text: brand new, but doesn't work at all. electrical no work. we opened up the box just yesterday, didn't realize there was a 1 month time to return item. now we're out 159.99.
customer_reviews.author: cece

customer_reviews.title: They don't make them like they used to...
customer_reviews.text: Nothing like the 1960's Shumacher unit that it replaced, but so far hitting all the high notes. The instructions, copper lead and sheet metal guage is disappointing. The "axle straps" want to fall inside the case. Don't waste 20 minutes like I did cracking the the case for retrieval. Hopefully the electronics are worthy.
customer_reviews.author: Topdown74

customer_reviews.title: Good charger- not the best- useless voltmeter
customer_reviews.text: Decent battery charger, assembly can be a pain. My wheels don't roll, it just skids. Charges great- don't buy this if you are buying it for the battery meter, all it is is a voltmeter. Otherwise, it is a good battery charger that does what it is suppose to do. Also, if the battery is completely dead, you will not be able to start the car until battery has a bit of charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeemin Park

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed. I got tired of messing ...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I got tired of messing around with the 60 dollar chargers. My truck battery was dead from sitting. I put this on and jumped it. Took 3 minutes to get it going.
customer_reviews.author: chris Bowman

customer_reviews.title: It's a keeper
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase and my husband uses it all the time now. We had not heard of this brand but the quality seems good and it seems well made. We are very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryss

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.text: This works great, I'm not sure how accurate the battery test feature is, but that's not what I bought this for.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: This works exactly as advertised. I'd give it 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: This works exactly as advertised. I'd give it 5 stars if the cables were longer. For a roll around type charger the cables are really too short. It barely reaches my trucks batteries when its set up right next to the truck.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: works good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have no problem with this charger for home use. I have a car that sets alot if the battery goes down the charger brings it up fairly quick.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Nice Charger / Booster for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this charger, and hooked it up to my 12Vdc riding lawn mower battery, charged it with 40 Amps for 10 minutes, then 2 Amps for 15 minutes, and then the mower with a V-Twin cylinder 22BHP Engine started on the first crank after a very cold winter. Would of been nice if the mfg. would put a couple brackets on the back of unit for AC power cord and two cables instead of having to wrap them around the handle. Very nice charger/booster with the 200Amp capability. Would purchase again, and stay away from the smaller units with no booster.
customer_reviews.author: D. Andersen

customer_reviews.title: It a good jump stater that's it
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! I bought two of the one for work one for my home they both have been sent back to Schumacher. They worked once after I got them back. Now I just want to throw away. Iput on a brand new battery and the gauge never moved even after I fully charged and we checked it with another charger
customer_reviews.author: Anthony LaSpina

customer_reviews.title: Good battery charger
customer_reviews.text: I've had one for decades until it was stolen. I've had smaller units. This on always works and is at least 4 times more powerful when you need to JumpStart a battery compared to the small units.
customer_reviews.author: HardlyHear

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic charger with tons of options. I use it for quick charger and jumping as i mostly use battery tenders, but it can do it all.
customer_reviews.author: William Billips

customer_reviews.title: hello got it with no dents and put together and works but the test gauge does not work
customer_reviews.text: came in right on time the test gauge does not work but no one elses does either so i used it it works so far but its getting cold fast in wisconsin
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wehr

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery charger!!
customer_reviews.text: It has already saved me money by being able to bring back to life a two-year old battery. I love the simplicity and versatility this battery charger has to offer.
customer_reviews.author: Transporter59

customer_reviews.title: Good inexpensive product that I use on my ranch
customer_reviews.text: Good inexpensive product that I use on my ranch. Tractor and field trucks have no problem with the use of the charger. It has saved me a lot of time which is money in my pocket. I recommend this product for use on any battery problem.
customer_reviews.author: john l.

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't Failed me yet!
customer_reviews.text: I use it leisurely to jump cars or tractors that've been sitting. Most batteries are a pain to recharge so i never wasted my time to do so.
customer_reviews.author: The Truckers Champ

customer_reviews.title: Total piece of junk. Inaccurate instructions, mis-sized screws ...
customer_reviews.text: Total piece of junk. Inaccurate instructions, mis-sized screws, tools listed as included not included. I returned.
customer_reviews.author: ToddS

customer_reviews.title: I gave little one because it was pretty beat up it was missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: I gave little one because it was pretty beat up it was missing pieces
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Nothings built like it used to be
customer_reviews.text: Well they don’t build anything like they used to and was a good little charger at first besides on 200amps it only runs 5 seconds barely enough time to get in the car and now the charger doesn’t work at all especially after I’ve only used it a total of 10 times very in happy
customer_reviews.author: Stan Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: daily user
customer_reviews.text: Use in shop daily. This unit worked 3 days and quit. Remove cover and found connectors to inverter had fell off. Reinstalled connectors in lock clips correctly. This appeared to be a poor assembly issue. This is our third charger of this brand in 20 years. We hope to get good service from this unit also.
customer_reviews.author: John D.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice battery charger!
customer_reviews.text: The quality and ease of use is very good. This charger works very well for my home shop. It would probably work ok in a commercial garage if you take care of it. The outside case is " light metal" which could get damaged very easily is caution wasn't taken. The price is well worth it. I would definitely recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: SJM

customer_reviews.title: Check the wires inside. During shipping might got bumped around. Made of thin metal. But works great
customer_reviews.text: The metal is very thin, when I got it the top has a bend in it and the plastic foot has a piece broken also putting the screws on I had to thread the holes. When I started to use it the fan was not working, so I took the top of and seen that the wires were disconnected once I plugged it in it all works great I have a YouTube video about it my channel is Brians farm and repairs
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Took a few minutes minutes to assemble, tires are ...
customer_reviews.text: Took a few minutes minutes to assemble, tires are plastic and have the caps you hammer on. Had a hard time putting on the handle . The screws did not want to start in the pre drilled holes.came we’ll packed. Waiting to use it. Seems ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great charger for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great charger for the money. This thing is way heavier duty than other chargers at this price point. We use it on our commercial fleet vehicles weekly, use it on forklifts and other large battery arrays. Battery check feature is kind of gimmicky, but core feature works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.author: C. H. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, works excellent! Didn't really expect for the price, the quality and ease of this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great All Purpose Charger
customer_reviews.text: I've been wanting this for a long time and I'm glad I bought one. Only took 10 minutes to assemble it after it safely arrived. Works great. It is a nice addition to my home garage for my cars , 12 volt lawn mowers and full-size 6 volt tractors.
customer_reviews.author: Bob N

customer_reviews.title: Bought as a gift.  He liked it.
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift. He liked it. Great charger, now I want one too.
customer_reviews.author: Blaine

customer_reviews.title: POOR quality
customer_reviews.text: One of the spring loaded electrical clamps bent after very little use. It entirely quit working after the first winter and never put out anywhere near the rated amps. Made in another country, (not noted for quality). Overpriced landfill.
customer_reviews.author: oskar1

customer_reviews.title: Works great no matter the weather
customer_reviews.text: Shipped quickly and there was no damage. Works great no matter the weather!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Waller

customer_reviews.title: Great Charger!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good charger. Had the same one for a few years in the shop, with heavy use and getting kicked around a lot. Finally died out, and we got the replaced shipped through Amazon for the same price as going to a local big box (who was out of stock at the time).
customer_reviews.author: AlexLovesAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was easy but the metal is so thin the screws strip ...
customer_reviews.text: Damaged when I got it. Wheels wont roll because the axel is to short. Assembly was easy but the metal is so thin the screws strip out easy. Cables are very light, not sure if this thing is built to last. Spend a little more and get a good one.
customer_reviews.author: ken

customer_reviews.title: Works great. My last charger( earlier version of the same ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. My last charger( earlier version of the same machine) did it's thing for 30+ years before it gave up. If this one does as well I will be impressed. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: xd40packer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Happy With This Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Arrived without a dent or scratch. It was extremely well packed. Used it on my lawn tractor battery and my truck. Schumacher battery charger worked above my expectations. I am very happy with this purchase. My tractor battery now turns the motor without any effort. All my batteries are well charged now.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much bought one for work and home
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one of these I purchased. Liked it so much bought one for work and home.
customer_reviews.author: GAVINTJ

customer_reviews.title: Nice unit
customer_reviews.text: Very good, but was missing parts. I contacted Schumacher direct and they shipped missing parts.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product does what it is designed to do. Jump started my honda accord v6 with a completely dead battery by letting it sit on the 200amp setting for 30 seconds and started right up.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene D. Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Good solid heavy duty charger
customer_reviews.text: This is the second of this brand of charger that I have purchased. The timer on the first one quit after about 5 years but the charger still worked until it was lost in a fire. The 200 amp start option is great for winter conditions. Definitely worth the money. The auto sensing shutoff feature would be nice though
customer_reviews.author: PCSheepman

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should. I replaced the wheels with ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. I replaced the wheels with a pair of solid rubber ones, the supplied set seemed inadequate. Also the front leg isn't as shown, It's a bolt on plastic piece that cracked after two weeks of moving around.
customer_reviews.author: S.D.E.

customer_reviews.title: Charger works great. However
customer_reviews.text: Charger works great. However, Charger was double packaged in cardboard with no damage to either box. Front RH lower corner on bottom was bent in. It would appear that Charger was initially packaged with this damage.
customer_reviews.author: GT Mustang

customer_reviews.title: Every nice product. I use it dozen time already works ...
customer_reviews.text: Every nice product . I use it dozen time already works will does everything they said it does
customer_reviews.author: Norbert Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great boost unit
customer_reviews.text: Just remember it is manual. My automatic 10/2 cost twice as much, but that is what you need for boat batteries. For using as a boost unit for the lawn tractor, and my 23 HP Kubota diesel, it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Camiemom

customer_reviews.title: I've added some photos since there isn't a lot of good ones of this particular charger
customer_reviews.text: Just unboxed and assembled. Reviews are accurate on quality, I've added some photos since there isn't a lot of good ones of this particular charger. Will update the review when I get a chance to test it out.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Great battery charger
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Schumacher SE-4022 for myself about 9 years ago. It is still going strong. I bought another one for my son's birthday. He loves it too. Very easy to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I liked it, and thought my brother would it as ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it, and thought my brother would it as well, but he wanted a pack and carry. had to send it back. He told they had one like it in the shop, and it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far real good. Works great, lots of capability and at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Very nice. I like that it has 12 volt and ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I like that it has 12 volt and 6volt charging. Works great. Case was bent on one corner bet easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Just what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Order this to replace a name brand tool companies charger that died after a couple o years of use. Arrived early and was easy to assemble. Works great and is exactly as stated in the description. Very pleased with this purchase. Priced this locally and it was $50+ than what it is on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: D. Reed

customer_reviews.title: Great Machine!
customer_reviews.text: The Schumacher SE-4022 battery charger has, so far, performed flawlessly. It has versatile settings, volt and amp readouts, and is simple to use. This particular design has been around for many years and it really works. If you need a battery charger with wheeled mobility, this is the one.., or one like it from Schumacher.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Brown/Stephen Brown

customer_reviews.title: Get one and throw out all the crap you've been wasting your time and money on!
customer_reviews.text: By far the best tester / charger I have ever owned. Easy to use and actually does what you need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: John Higgins

customer_reviews.title: A must have in my household.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived intact. No damage on the packing. The unit however had some dent on the bottom that necessitated straightening out so that the wheel axle could be mounted with the U clamp. The bottom was warped out of plane. Unit still functional.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Nolasco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Used it to jump start a car and maintain a couple of car batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great out of box easy to assemble hooked up to ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great out of box easy to assemble hooked up to my 90 horsepower tractor immediately and charged on two amp all night and in the morning it fired right up I love that it is manual not digital since my pickup has two batteries. the digital ones always turn off unless i unhook one battery this one will charge both batteries at the same time on trickle charge and works great. The 200 amp helps big diesel engines turn over easier.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find manual setting chargers anymore, this one works great.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: great charger
customer_reviews.text: Got this for hubby for Christmas. He loves it. It is everything he thought it would be. The shipping was a great deal and it got here in time for the holiday. Perfect job Schumacher and Amazon! The battery tester and charger are great. We have yet to try the independent jumper cable option.
customer_reviews.author: horse lover

customer_reviews.title: Parts for assembly didnt match need...
customer_reviews.text: The screws that were included for assembly didnt fit. It included 2 screws that worked... needed to go purchase the rest to finish assembling the stand/handle set up. I hope the machine works better than the parts list.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good charger
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. Would give it 5 stars except the first one i got looked like it had been hurled off a rooftop and did not work.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S.

customer_reviews.title: I like the timer
customer_reviews.text: Had it 3 months now, probably used 10 times. Starts my truck and tractor on freezing days no problem. Seems to be well built. I like the timer. Only minor complaint, could use slightly longer cables, but that's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon R. Wood

customer_reviews.title: Horrible warranty
customer_reviews.text: Junk Absolutely junk Will not turn on used maybe 9 times to bench charge battery now won’t charge Horrible warranty
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Works as sold so far. I was able to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as sold so far. I was able to charge and then cold start my bobcat kubota diesel without much left in the battery. This is the type of scenario I bought this for.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Some assembly required. Like the handle and wheels put on.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: Great charger. Only issue was that the handle mounting ...
customer_reviews.text: Great charger. Only issue was that the handle mounting screws were too large or the holes in the case were too small. Drilled them out and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: It brought back an Optima Red Top that 2 other chargers couldn't.
customer_reviews.text: It works great, much better then the small trickle charger/maintainers. I got it on sale, and it paid for itself by saving an Optima red top that no other charger could recognize. I lost the wheel retainer hubs before assembly and Schumacher sent me two new ones no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I was sick of dead batteries, and even more disgusted with having to buy replacement batteries. (Yes, I've had trickle chargers. No matter what, the batteries still died when not in constant use.) So now I take the mostly dead battery and give it a BIG 200A boost and the equipment starts right up. (So, you may ask, what happens if you kill the mower away from the charger/ booster? You start another mower and tow it back.) The Schumacher SE-4022 does exactly what I needed it to!
customer_reviews.author: Weimaranchand

customer_reviews.title: Good medium duty charger
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking charger. It is a good deal for its price. The cables are 8 ga. Would be a nice charger for a car repair shop if kept inside and taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bullard

customer_reviews.title: Difficient
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last September and it stopped working by itself after i used only few times.
customer_reviews.author: H. Bawab

customer_reviews.title: Refund
customer_reviews.text: Does not charge anything worked first time nothing after that how do I get a refund? Bought in January 2018!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised, but...
customer_reviews.text: Its a great product but you must have a battery with some good cells in the car to jump it and you need it plugged in to a socket. The cord is short so you will need an extension cord.
customer_reviews.author: Angel F.

product_meta.title: Schumacher SE-4022 2/10/40/200 Amp Manual Wheeled Battery Charger and Tester,Black
product_meta.description: Schumacher Battery Charger, Manual, 2 - 12 hr, 4 Batteries, 6/12 VDC, 7.2 V, 120 VAC Output, 2/10/40/200 A, 6 ft Cord, Steel, 9-7/8 in Overall Length, 11.7 in Overall Width, 19 in Overall Height, UL Listed, For Works with Fleet Operations, Professional
feature_bullets: Equipped with cooling fan for high-performance and long life
Accommodates both 6 and 12-volt batteries. Heavy-duty transformer. Temperature overload protection
Analyzes electrical and starting system problems.Ideal for charging expended vehicle batteries
Includes two rotary switches and a voltmeter. Item does not ship to CA.
This product cannot be shipped to Oregon or California
Helps in fleet operations , easy-to-read, color-coded meters. 2-1/4 hour timer. 6 ft power cord and output cables for a total reach of 12 ft

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars618 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
